inputs.name: ofAsset
inputs.description: address for which specific information is requested

abiDocs.name: remove
abiDocs.details: Owner can delete an existing entry

inputs.name: ofAsset
inputs.description: Address of asset to be registered

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Human-readable name of the Asset as in ERC223 token standard

inputs.name: symbol
inputs.description: Human-readable symbol of the Asset as in ERC223 token standard

inputs.name: decimal
inputs.description: Human-readable symbol of the Asset as in ERC223 token standard

inputs.name: url
inputs.description: Url for extended information of the asset

inputs.name: ipfsHash
inputs.description: Same as url but for ipfs

inputs.name: breakIn
inputs.description: Address of break in contract on destination chain

inputs.name: breakOut
inputs.description: Address of break out contract on this chain

abiDocs.name: register
abiDocs.details: Pre: Only registrar owner should be able to registerPost: Address ofAsset is registered
abiDocs.notice: Registers an Asset residing in a chain

inputs.name: ofAsset
inputs.description: Address of the asset to be updated

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Human-readable name of the Asset as in ERC223 token standard

inputs.name: symbol
inputs.description: Human-readable symbol of the Asset as in ERC223 token standard

inputs.name: url
inputs.description: Url for extended information of the asset

inputs.name: ipfsHash
inputs.description: Same as url but for ipfs

abiDocs.name: updateDescriptiveInformation
abiDocs.details: Pre: Owner can change an existing entryPost: Changed Name, Symbol, URL and/or IPFSHash
abiDocs.notice: Updates description information of a registered Asset
